SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE = 0
AND (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE = 0
AND (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE ASC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH, COUNT(L.MEM_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN FAV_BOARD L ON B.BOARD_NO = L.BOARD_NO WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE = 0
AND (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE = 0
AND (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH ORDER BY COMMENT_COUNT DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS_CODE, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
